name: Speed Cola
description: A dark-green fizzy drink. You still remember the old jingle - 'Just take a sip, you will move faster, just try it now!' Let's hope it didn't expire...

use_action.activation_message: You chug the Speed Cola like it's going out of style.

name: Stamin-Up
description: A yellow-hued soda. You still remember the old jingle - 'Let's run the extra mile! I'll make it worth your while!' Let's hope it didn't expire...

use_action.activation_message: You chug the Stamin-Up like it's going out of style.

name: Deadshot Daiquiri
description: A white-ish non-alcoholic cocktail. You still remember the old jingle - 'In deadshot heaven, we pop skulls for fun! Zero in baby, zero on that spot!' Let's hope it didn't expire...

use_action.activation_message: You chug the Stamin-Up like it's going out of style.

name: Amm-O-Matic
description: A simple milk drink. You still remember the old jingle - 'Buy an Amm-O-Matic and you too can see what it feels like to hold the power of the gods in your hands!' Let's hope it didn't expire...

name: Tufbrew
description: A classic, thick wheat beer. Due to how new it was, you never really heard its jingle, but just the smell makes you feel like you could take on the world. Let's hope it didn't expire...

use_action.activation_message: You chug the Tufbrew like it's going out of style.

name: Juggernog
description: A strawberry-flavoured soda. You still remember the old jingle - 'When you need to feel big and strong, reach for Juggernog tonight!' Let's hope it didn't expire...

use_action.activation_message: You chug the Juggernog like it's going out of style.

name: Death Perception Soda
description: An orange-y soda. You still remember the old jingle - 'Some say seek and you will find. Just don't let this blow your mind. And when you need precision, we'll enhance your vision. Death Perception!' Let's hope it didn't expire...

use_action.activation_message: You chug the Death Perception Soda like it's going out of style.

name: Quick Revive Soda
description: A classic, cola-like soft drink. You still remember the old jingle - 'When everything's, been draggin' you down, grabs you by the hair and pulls you to the ground, if you wanna get up, you need a little revive. If you wanna get up... YOU NEED A LITTLE REVIIIIIIVE!...YEAH! ' Let's hope it didn't expire...

use_action.activation_message: You chug the Quick Revive Soda like it's going out of style.

name: Double Tap Root Beer
description: A simple root beer, albeit with a coppery aftertaste. You still remember the old jingle - 'Cowboys can't shoot slow, or they'll end up below, when they need some help, they reach for the root beer shelf.' Let's hope it didn't expire...

use_action.activation_message: You chug the Double Tap Root Beer like it's going out of style.

name: Bandolier Bandit Soda
description: A cherry-flavoured soda. You still remember the old jingle - 'To the town of Agua Fria rode a stranger one fine day, hardly spoke to folks around him, didn't have too much to say. Noone dared to ask his business, noone dared to make a slip, for the stranger there among them had a big band' on his hip!' Let's hope it didn't expire...

use_action.activation_message: You chug the Bandolier Bandit Soda like it's going out of style.

name: Mule Kick Cerveza
description: A strong Pilsner-like beer. You still remember the old jingle - 'ARRIIIBAA!!! QUE PASA!!! When you're 'round Louisiana, Nawlins or Texarkana. Lord you want more firepower, MULE KICK! (Hee-Haw, Hee-Haw).' Let's hope it didn't expire...

use_action.activation_message: You chug the Mule Kick Cerveza like it's going out of style.

name: Blood Wolf Bite Shake
description: A strawberry-chocolate milkshake. You still remember the old jingle - 'I've gotten too old to outrun my mistake, I'm too tired to grapple with revenge, so let me be by your side - Blood Wolf!' Let's hope it didn't expire...
